forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light freezing rain expected. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light freezing rain expected. Low 28F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain early...changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain in the morning...changing to rain showers later. High 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light freezing rain expected. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain. Low 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain early...changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain early...changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Freezing rain and rain mixed in the evening will change over to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain in the evening will give way to snow showers late. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then mainly snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.
